text: “Ndipo auze nkhani yabwino amene akhulupirira nachita ntchito zabwino (molungama) kuti ndithu adzalandira minda ya mtendere momwe mitsinje ikuyenda pansi pake (ndi patsogolo pake). Nthawi iliyonse kumeneko akapatsidwa zipatso ngati chakudya, adzakhala akunena: “Izi ndizomwe tidapatsidwa kale,” (chifukwa chakuti) adzapatsidwa zipatso zofanana (m’maonekedwe ake ndi zimene adapatsidwapo kale.
